CDISC Notes:
Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications
or submissions involving the product.

1. Clinical encounter number. (Decimal numbering may be useful for inserting
unplanned visits.)
2. Numeric version of VISIT, used for sorting.

1. Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter.
2. May be used in addition to VISITNUM and/or VISITDY as a text description
of the clinical encounter.

Planned study day of the start of the visit based upon RFSTDTC in
Demographics.

Variable Label:
Study Day of Start of
Visit
CDISC Notes: Study day of start of visit relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.

Variable Label:
Study Day of End of
Visit
CDISC Notes: Study day of end of visit relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.
Description of what happened to the subject during an unplanned visit.
